feed.title: Ecological and Evolutionary Genomics | GEOMAR
feed.subtitle: The ecological and evolutionary genomics research group at GEOMAR.

entry.title: Jenny Nascimento-Schulze joins the lab
entry.content: Jenny Nascimento-Schulze joins the group as our newest (and first!) postdoc! Jenny did her phd with at the University of Exeter with Robert Ellis working on shellfish population genetics and global change. Here she will be working on the temporal genomics of adaptation, focusing on detecting balancing and directional selection in copepods. Welcome Jenny!
entry.summary: Jenny Nascimento-Schulze joins the group as our newest (and first!) postdoc! entry.title: New Lab Website
entry.content: Welcome to our new lab website. Here we will post updates and news from the group.
